headline.main: The Link Between Frugality and Health

docs.abstract: A majority of middle-class Americans say their methods of cutting back spending in the past year are making them healthier, according to new survey results.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here's an unlikely effect of recession: It may actually be helping some Americans improve their health.
docs.snippet: A majority of middle-class Americans say their methods of cutting back spending in the past year are making them healthier, according to new survey results.
